result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Scott A. Seidel

records.addlTxt:
NO RECORD MADE. Attorney Daniel Alejandro Bernard Deida appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Joseph Corcoran in court for Scott A. Seidel.  Defendant Scott A. Seidel appeared by video. Clerk. M.Burke. Attorney Corcoran advises that he does not have an offer yet.
Status conference scheduled for December 16, 2022 at 10:00 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Scott A. Seidel
Current: 608B Cornerstone Crossway, Waterford, WI 53185 United States  (Effective: 08-22-2022)
Prior: 1917 67th Street, Kenosha, WI 53143 United States

Defendant Scott A. Seidel appeared with Attorney Joseph Corcoran.  Defendant in custody.  Assistant District Attorney Daniel Bernard Deida appeared for the State.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  DE waives preliminary hearing; probable cause found.  Bound over.   Information filed; reading waived.  Not guilty plea entered. Scheduling Order given to Attorney in court. DE motion to modify bond; arguments heard; Court modifies bond to $600 cash with same conditions (see bond event).  Judicial Pretrial - in court scheduled for October 13, 2022 at 09:00 am.

PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.
  *Not to Possess or Consume Alcohol.  *Not To Possess or Consume Controlled Substances w/o a Prescription.  *Not to drive w/o VALID Driver's License.  No drug paraphenalia

records.addlTxt: Defendant Scott A. Seidel in court, in custody.  Attorney Daniel Alejandro Bernard Deida appeared for the Prosecution.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  SPD has been unable to appoint an attorney for DE for today's hearing. Court holds colloquy with DE re: proceeding pro se or waiving time to allow SPD to appoint an attorney.  DE waives time for preliminary hearing. Court reschedules preliminary hearing to an attorney status hearing.  Bond continued.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 19, 2022 at 08:45 am.

PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.
  *Not to Possess or Consume Alcohol.  *Not To Possess or Consume Controlled Substances w/o a Prescription.  *Not to drive w/o VALID Driver's License.  No drug paraphenalia
